review_text: Opening a demat account with Groww was incredibly simple and fully digital. I didn’t need to fill any paperwork or visit a branch. The app guided me through each step seamlessly. It’s great for anyone new to investing. Within minutes, I was ready to buy and sell the stocks. I appreciate how user-friendly the process was—Groww made it completely hassle-free and beginner-friendly.

It's been a while I'm using this platform for my investment specially for buying stocks and SIP investment, charts are very easy to consume, I would recommend this app for everyone, it's an effortless thing to do. I have also started investing in IPO through this app, it has a really good interface. Additionally I love the feature where I can see my all mutual fund investments at one place by importing it on the app 👍👍

absolutely the most amazing platform for investing in mutual funds as well as for stocks. I have already made 5+ people from my friends and family network to register on this platform. it is so easy to register and start investing, it is just phenomenal. thank you for setting a great standard for all other competitors and setting the benchmark so high that it is difficult to reach this height.. great product. I keep highly recommending this to others....

There's no option to increase the font size. Even after increasing the device font, still its too small. It's so uncomfortable to read . Further to go on the main detailed chart page. We had to go through and click at least 2-3 links. Then there's no option to save chart settings. This mobile app is not user and trader friendly. Now I will check it on web app. If same issues are there then there's no option left but to delete the account.

Hi groww team, kindly add an option to sort by fund types in MF dashboard. if we have multiple funds it seems like cluttering. most people have been telling this for the last 2 yrs but no improvement.

the app is very simple and user friendly, the UI/UX is beautiful,especially the colour combination and themes used in the app. Also they provide in detail information about the assets in which the person wishes to invest.
Bug report: Exit button not working sometimes in Scalper mode

Looking for zero brokerage on delivery trades. Edited: High charges. Edited: Again they hiked charges. Planning to close account. Edited: If someone is not interested in F&O and Loan menu then you should provide an option to disable through customisation. These options decrease the speed of traders. They distract us.

Very unhappy with customer support team from last one week I had contact them but they are not able to give me the right information they not receiving call they don't care of customer problem once you read it grow please call me back again today sbfc is 6 percent upper side still showing 3 percent on grow also last query not solve they just don't care about you they just rob your money by this glitch

charts are fine in day, but after 8:00 P.M. Charts gets frozen. I click for live candle chart, It shows chart of something else, I was looking for a chart of oil mini which was trading around 9, it was showing me chart of random stock trading at 40, apart from that chart can not be zoomed, it was shrank all candles were baerly visible as a line.

Very Good app. most features we need is all inbuilt. Only thing I found is little lag. most notifications are delayed. From opening bell to my watchlist stocks performance notifications. Whenever it touches all time high or low notifications are coming only after 15 minutes. If it is resolved, 5★

bakwaas app. zero ⭐ to this app. Paisa deposit toh jldi ho jata hai. par apna Paisa withdrawal Krna ho toh ek din. shame on this kind of app. maha bekar app withdrawal Krna ho toh 2-3 din aur deposit sath ke sath. poor app. instant withdrawal kya bakwaas hai. ghatiya app sirf fees charge krte hai help koi nahi krte. instant withdrawal option shutdown kar do.

I called related to this issue but I'm not satisfied. I'd like to go legally for this, is there anything that could be done before that? I emailed screenshot for reference how it glitched moving up and down in very short duration eating away my profit from 55k brought it to 5k, likely by operator. On US gold futures I don't see this glitch hence it's a blatant lie that charts are loaded externally. Also they lied about app not being upto date, attached same in email. Try fix the profit atleast.

brokerage is too high. They charge two ✌ times for one order we made everytime. I don't understand when we buy something then how they can say that's complete order. when we buy then we have to sale that stock or commodity also then our one order gonna be completed. or when we sale we have to buy that back then it's gonna completed. they are charging use both side to complete one order. this is not good I don't like it. I know this app is excellent but my concern I is all aboutbrokeragecharge.

App requires too many clicks to get the results for example if you want to open a specific watchlist first you need to scroll horizontally to see the 'All watchlist', then select your watchlist. Equity and F&O position and orders are placed at different places. The most annoying part is that it does not have AMO order features for F&O.
User interface is very beautiful ❤️❤️ Clear and clean. suggest for my friends... 1 point of this app is dual chart in one display is not available... please apply for the dual chart sir

I request everyone to use a different app.. because this apps customer support is completely unusable.. they don't receive call and if they receive by any chance they just cut the call after listening your problem and on chat they do the same.. reaching them takes 2 or 3 hours.. and if can reach they just closed the chat or cut the call... rubbish

I'm using from Long time No Use too much charges nowadays and no recommendations nothing simply loose money.. it's not Groww it's Loss App

try using (sahi) , nubra, etc why ❓ -> it used to be free of brokerage for delivery orders, but now no matter how small you are buying, you have to pay minimum ₹5 brokerage for each buy sell or delivery 🙂 + gst and other charges also have to paid very upset news, it's not for beginners now

Good UI, but brokrage charges is very high though. I had to sell 2 of my etfs with ammt approx. Rs. 2500/- as charge they cut the ammt of Rs. 61.00 in that only 10 rs of brokerage mentioned and other Rs 51.00 charges is hidden, this is ridiculous. thank god i didn't buy and sell frequently. I will not buy any single etf, stock from groww henceforth.

App interface is worst. No option to deactivate f&o and commodities. Shockingly, they will activate f&o and commodities on their own without customer's approval. And later say that their app has option to activate but not deactivat f&o. They don't look trustworthy.

21-01-2026 : one order was processed and then two more processed by groww until all of the amount was redeemed. it's not a bug. it's how they will lose customers. Don't use it. better go with Indmoney or zerodha.

Even target price cross, target not triggered in intra day trading in groww platform. At the time I click emergency quick exit all option position tab, groww system create mistakenly short sell order based on TP or SL price. I get significant loss due to groww permanent software error. Lot of backend programming error technical glitch. It's a permanent software error from Groww platform. Once you apply for IPO, you can't cancel your request. They will take the whole day to cancel and if it's last day you can't apply again just because they won't cancel. Contacted support and that's how they say it works

Been with Groww for 7+ years now. Not seen a platform which is so intuitive and where transparency is given such importance and where users experience is equally thought about along with process. Great support team too. Stay the same Groww.. Let's Groww together. Thank you

I’ve been using the Grow app for a while now and honestly, it’s one of the best apps I’ve added to my phone. From the moment I signed up, everything felt intuitive and user-friendly. The interface is clean, simple, and easy to navigate — perfect whether you’re a beginner or more experienced.

If you need to begin your Financial Journey somewhere, this is it. I am just speechless of how easy , simple, still detailed this App this about almost every Financial step you want to take. One stop solution for all that you need.

Groww has proven to be an exceptional trading platform, offering consistently smooth performance across all segments. Its clean, intuitive interface is particularly valuable for fast-paced activities like option trading and scalping. The platform's ability to maintain a simple user experience while delivering powerful features makes it a reliable tool for traders. Everything feels snappy and the indicators are super easy to apply. And overall experience gas been great 👍 👌
